Hero.title: Our 'old school' way of keeping you up to date on our whereabouts

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.content: We are Davide and Beatrice, a software engineer and a freelance designer. We have just started our journey around the world and wanted to find a way to keep our family and close friends up to date on our whereabouts by sharing a few of our stories.

Footer.message: Subscribe to our newsletter, and follow us around the world
